com.datastax.oss.dsbulk.codecs.api

Interface ConvertingCodecProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanConvertingCodecsProvider, CollectionConvertingCodecsProvider, JsonNodeConvertingCodecProvider, MapConvertingCodecsProvider, NumericConvertingCodecsProvider, StringConvertingCodecProvider, TemporalConvertingCodecsProvider

    public interface ConvertingCodecProvider
    A provider for ConvertingCodecs. Providers are discovered by ConvertingCodecFactory using the Service Loader API.

    • Method Summary
